; Tue, 05 Dec 2023 14:55:22 +0800 那些痴迷过山车的人：“事故是小概率事件”http://www.infzm.com/contents/261892
;;2023-12-05 14:00:00;
;

;;

;

;2016, Busch Gardens, Tampa, USA, roller coaster" Cheetah". Photo by Xun Hang

;

;On National Day this year, Xun Hang completed the 480th roller coaster check-in in Europe. As a high-risk amusement equipment, roller coasters have a history of more than 100 years since their birth in the 19th century, and have been introduced to China for nearly 40 years. To some extent, they have become a reference for measuring the configuration level of an amusement park.
;

;

;"I don't have the most, some friends have more than 800." Xun Hang, 32, has been riding roller coasters for ten years. ". He could not remember the details of his first roller coaster ride as a child. He only remembered that "it felt like I was going to fly. It was very exciting and very happy." Since then, I have wanted to go to an amusement park every holiday, and every time I go to an amusement park, I must ride the roller coaster.

;

;"Among the many projects in amusement parks, most equipment is highly homogeneous, but roller coasters can be infinitely varied." In order to have a better and more experience It’s a rollercoaster. When he was a student, Xun Hang visited many cities in China. After working as an adult, he expanded his footprints to North America, Japan, South Korea, Australia, Europe, the Middle East and other places.

;

;It is difficult to explain to outsiders why my hobby is riding roller coasters. Around 2010, Xun Hang found several roller coaster fans like himself through some forums and forums. In order to keep warm and share information, they formed a fan group called "Roller Coaster Dream". Thirteen years later, this small team, which started with just a few people, now has nearly 150 members.

;

;On October 27, 2023, an accident occurred at the roller coaster "Snow Eagle" project in Shenzhen Happy Valley. A roller coaster broke down after going uphill along the track. It slipped and collided with another roller coaster that had arrived at the station and was discharging passengers, resulting in 4 serious injuries and 13 minor injuries. In November, the State Administration for Market Regulation deployed a nationwide special investigation and management of hidden dangers of roller coaster accidents to resolutely prevent the recurrence of roller coaster accidents like the "10·27" roller coaster accident at Shenzhen Happy Valley.

;

;Despite major negative events, the enthusiasm of roller coaster fans has not diminished. Xun Hang noticed that most members of "Roller Coaster Dream" regarded the above-mentioned accidents as sporadic cases and regarded them as "small probability events."

;

;;

;

;On October 20, 2021, tourists were playing the Shenzhen Happy Valley roller coaster "Snowy Eagle" project The screaming continued. Visual China

;

;One in 17 million chance of injury

;

;It is reported that the "Snowy Eagle" roller coaster in Shenzhen Happy Valley , officially opened in July 2012, with a total of two trains. The track length of the car is 887 meters, with the highest point reaching 60 meters. It is one of the tallest and longest catapult roller coasters built in China. It can run at a speed of 135 kilometers per hour. It is also one of the fastest roller coasters built in China.

;

;"We didn't believe it at first, but later we realized it was true." Yang Kaichun, a member of "Roller Coaster Dream" said that the reason why he was surprised was because " "Snowy Eagle" has the "very safe" elements recognized by experienced players - brand parks, large-scale equipment and first-tier manufacturers.

;

;23-year-old Yang Kaichun has experience riding nearly 200 roller coasters. The first time he rode a roller coaster, he was in sixth grade at Lotte World in South Korea. He was timid and reluctantly got on the roller coaster with the encouragement of his mother and the companionship of his younger brother. "I sat down and took a lap and found that it was different from what I thought. Not only was it not scary, it was also very exciting. After sitting there, I was still unsatisfied and wanted to wait in line again."

;

;This experience made Yang Kaichun have a strong interest in roller coasters. What is the control system of this unpowered car? How are the track paths designed? How to grasp human physiological limits during tumbling and spinning? How relevant is the human riding experience to the overall design?

;

;In order to satisfy his curiosity, Yang Kaichun not only searched for roller coaster-related materials on the Internet, but also visited various parks at home and abroad. He even chose to go to college. majored in mechanical engineering.

;

;Roller coaster is a niche hobby, but Yang Kaichun has found many like-minded friends. In addition to sharing his experience on roller coasters, he also enjoys discussing the mechanical principles and control systems of roller coasters with like-minded people. "It was a very pure and selfless exchange. Everyone didn't care whether they offended others. They just quarreled over an issue, but it didn't affect their feelings at all. Everyone purely loved roller coasters."

;

;After the "October 27" roller coaster accident at Shenzhen Happy Valley, a heated discussion started in the "Roller Coaster Dream" WeChat group. "The discussion started mainly at the technical level, and everyone speculated that there might be a problem with the anti-retraction device." Xun Hang said.

;

;Xun Hang said that among the members of "Roller Coaster Dream", some may reduce the frequency of riding similar roller coasters from the same manufacturer in the near future, but overall, "the It’s time to go to the amusement park to visit the amusement park.”

;

;In the past ten years of riding experience on hundreds of roller coasters, these roller coaster fans claim that they have never encountered personal safety incidents, which makes them believe that roller coasters The safety is very high. "If the probability of an accident on an airplane is much lower than driving to the airport (the probability of an accident), then the probability of an accident on a roller coaster is also much lower than driving to the amusement park."

;

;Xunhang brushed 480 cars. He only experienced a bumpy ride caused by the uneven track of the roller coaster, which "knocked his knees red"; fans both (pseudonyms) brushed the cars More than 320 vehicles have never experienced a "risk situation", but they encountered service personnel buckling their shoulders but not wearing seat belts when riding in a car, and did not carry out "double insurance"; Yang Kaichun brushed 200 vehicles and experienced this in the United States. During a "hanging parking", the car climbed to the highest point and got stuck. Finally, under the command of the park management staff, everyone collectively "jumped" forward before continuing to "start"...

;

;The safety of roller coasters reflected in individual experience also has some objective basis. According to statistics from the International Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions in October 2023, the probability of people being injured on amusement equipment is about 3.7 times per million people, which is lower than playing football, swimming, cycling, etc. Based on a three-year average, the probability of someone being injured on a fixed theme park ride is one in 17 million.

;

;"If the vehicle hovers in the preset area, or encounters collisions, etc., these are common problems that will not cause safety issues for passengers. Not only are we not afraid , such as hovering, sometimes I hope to experience it and enrich the riding experience." Xun Hang said. Other roller coaster enthusiasts interviewed were similar to Xun Hang in their identification of roller coaster safety risks.

;

;However, in the eyes of professionals, hovering is not always a "common problem" even if it does not cause casualties. "Under normal circumstances, if passengers hover in a normal position, there will be no safety problems. However, if the hovering time is too long, or if the hovering is upside down with the head down, many parks will pay special attention to it, and even if the situation is serious, Report it to the national competent authority," said Han Zhiyi, a well-known theme park executive.

;

;Lin Huanjie, president of the China Theme Park Research Institute, reminded that whether it is a small problem or a major accident, tourists should maintain their safety when riding a roller coaster and encounter unexpected situations such as hovering. Stay calm and wait patiently for guidance and rescue from the staff. Do not shake the car violently out of excitement and panic. "Because people's excessive reactions may affect the equipment's ability to handle emergency situations according to the design plan."

;

;;

;

;On September 17, 2023 local time, Munich, Germany, the roller coaster at the Oktoberfest. On September 16, two roller coasters collided at the Munich Oktoberfest, injuring eight people. Visual China

;

;“Every car has a new experience”

;

;Different from the short-lived stimulating experience that ordinary tourists occasionally ride on a roller coaster, The experience gained by these experienced players from high-frequency car brushing seems to better capture the designer's intention.

;

;"I think roller coasters are the epitome of contemporary human wisdom. Whether roller coasters are excellent or not often tests the artistic aesthetics, manufacturing technology, scientific and technological level of designers and manufacturers, and even medicine. Common sense." Xun Hang said. He believes that the wonderful thing about roller coasters is that almost every car has a new experience, and even the same car has a different feeling every time it is ridden.

;

;During the National Day holiday this year, Xun Hang rode a catapult-type spinning roller coaster in Belgium. In his opinion, this car not only combines two seemingly unrelated elements of spin and electromagnetic ejection, but also relies on the up and down track to allow riders to experience ejection one after another. "The car body is always spinning irregularly, and you never seem to know what the next spin will feel like."

;

;This roller coaster also has an electromagnetic section In the ejection area, the vehicle travels to the second section. Relying on a vertical undulating slope section, the roller coaster accelerates while losing weight. There are also tumbling elements interspersed in the middle, making people feel like they are in a washing machine. The overall feeling was hearty and comfortable, so much so that Xun Hang "swiped it 8 times a day."

;

;"Compared with the feeling of pushing back and explosive power, I especially prefer the feeling of weightlessness brought by roller coasters. The heart feels like being pulled up, and people will experience a kind of weightlessness. The ultimate pleasure." Xun Hang said. This ride experience in Belgium greatly satisfied his preference for weightlessness, so it became his "favorite".

;

;As for Yang Kaichun, in addition to the ultimate riding experience, he also hopes to know what is happening and why. All aspects related to the roller coaster riding experience will become his exploration issues.

;

;In terms of the appearance of the track, the material used is often hard steel, but when it forms the winding and circling track of the roller coaster, it appears smooth and smooth, and the overall appearance A kind of beauty that combines strength and softness. The track construction of some large-scale parks can often become landmark buildings.

;

;As a vehicle without power, the riding experience of a roller coaster is often closely related to the direction of the track. Under different logics, designers need to consider not only whether the passengers will The physical safety of being dropped also needs to consider what physiological reactions a person will have as their physical position changes under a given sprint, rotation or gravity acceleration, and explore the safety margin of this reaction.

;

;"Under a given acceleration of gravity, a person's body may be suspended in the air, or as if he is flying, or as if he is climbing on top of a boulder... I am very curious about this kind of How do you create a safe, moderate but exciting feeling?" Yang Kaichun said.

;

;Both like the ups and downs of riding a roller coaster, and can also immerse themselves in the fun of different themes. Parks in different countries will have different themes when building roller coasters. For example, most Chinese parks will incorporate some traditional cultural elements, while European and American parks will be linked to Disney, Marvel and other styles. Along with lighting, VR, water spray and other effects, riding a roller coaster is often like experiencing a "fantasy journey".

;

;More often, they simply like the happiness brought by roller coasters. This kind of happiness is not only brought by physical stimulation, but also by the excitement surrounding them. A happy atmosphere. "Whether you are watching the roller coaster or riding the roller coaster, everyone is very happy. Seeing so many happy smiling faces makes you happy too."

;

;;

;

;In 2016, the roller coaster "El Toro" at Six Flags Great Adventure in the United States. Photo by Xun Hang

;

;“China’s safety standards are stricter”

;

;Car fans believe that their trust in the safety of roller coasters does not arise blindly .

;

;As an iconic amusement facility that has gone through a century of history, roller coasters have corresponding safety standards for their production, installation, operation, maintenance, and retirement.

;

;Lin Huanjie introduced that at present, domestic large-scale roller coasters are mainly imported. Such equipment must be submitted to China's special equipment testing agency for review during the design stage. Place an order for production, and a dedicated person needs to be assigned to supervise on-site during the production process.

;

;After the roller coaster is installed, it needs to complete a certain hour of testing in accordance with the manufacturer's requirements, and then conduct an idling test and load test again in accordance with China's national standards.

;

;During the equipment declaration and operation stage, the regulatory authorities will not only review the filing materials, but also conduct on-site testing of the equipment. After completion, the trial operation qualification will be issued first. During this period, no safety problems will occur, and then the formal operation qualification will be given.

;

;After the official operation, in addition to regular inspections such as daily inspection, monthly inspection, and annual inspection, the roller coaster will also conduct safety management and maintenance of the equipment in accordance with the requirements of the manufacturer. Welcome the random inspection by the superior unit of the park and the corresponding regulatory department.

;

;Corresponding to the aforementioned security defense lines, there is a series of institutional documents.

;

;Many interviewees mentioned that when it comes to the management of roller coasters, China’s safety standards are stricter than those in countries such as Europe, the United States, Japan and South Korea. "For example, when we play in China, we are generally not allowed to bring backpacks, mobile phones, keys and other items, but in European and American countries, they are more casual and don't care much." Yang Kaichun said.

;

;Lin Huanjie believes that safety problems in roller coasters are generally related to front-end design flaws, mid-end detection loopholes, and inadequate follow-up operation and maintenance. In reality, "it is difficult for a large-scale accident to occur if there is a simple flaw in a certain link. Safety problems are often caused by the accumulation of layer-by-layer failures in multiple security inspection links."

;

;It is worth noting that the interviewees related to the operation and management of the park said that the safety issues of roller coasters in the real environment are often related to whether the operator strictly follows the Provisions are made to implement inspection, maintenance and upkeep.

;

;"For example, in order to save money, some operators do not replace some parts that should be replaced, do not repair those that should be repaired, and do not repair some equipment that should be overhauled; Some problems are also related to unprofessional operators, who cannot detect problems, or it is difficult to strictly enforce regulations during peak seasons." A professional close to a special equipment testing agency revealed.

;

;In November 2023, the State Administration for Market Regulation launched a nationwide safety inspection of roller coasters, which emphasized the need to consolidate the manufacturing, operation and use of large-scale amusement facilities. The main responsibility for unit safety.

;

;In addition, whether the management and operation of the equipment are professional and standardized is also related to the scale and conditions of the park where the equipment is located. Many interviewees said that in some cities, small parks, street parks, carnival venues, etc., because most of the equipment are non-first-line brands, and there are fewer passengers, the management and operation are also relatively loose. In comparison, the stability of the equipment and poor security. Respondents do not recommend riding roller coasters in some overseas countries that rely on human traction, roller coasters that are old and rusty in appearance, or roller coasters that have a high rate of bumps and complaints.

;

;When safety incidents occur on roller coasters, passengers sometimes bear some responsibility. "It happened once before. Because there was a lot of cash in the bag, a tourist took the bag from the locker on the platform to the foot of the car at the moment of departure after depositing the bag. As a result, when the car flipped over, the bag was hit upside down. Passengers in the back." Han Zhiyi said.

;

;In addition, the aforementioned professionals also introduced that the roller coaster track is equipped with multiple highly sensitive sensors, and sometimes small objects dropped by passengers can be broken into as foreign objects. Identification, affecting the regular operation of the roller coaster. However, Lin Huanjie said that among the many roller coaster problems, the probability of them being triggered by tourists is extremely small.

;

;Xun Hang believes that some people currently have some misunderstandings about roller coasters, such as equating roller coasters with extreme sports, or equating excitement with danger, but "this project It’s about experiencing excitement, not looking for conventional comfort.” In his opinion, in most cases, riding a roller coaster is safe and can bring people some ultimate pleasure. "We hope that everyone can understand it more comprehensively and enjoy it more relaxedly."

;Spend 300,000 to buy a job within the establishment? Li from Jiangxi Province listened to a friend's promise to transfer 300,000 yuan to him and asked him to help with the official establishment work of a certain unit. However, the work was not completed and the money was wasted. On December 4, Nandu reporters learned from the Jiangxi Higher People’s Court that Li sued the court for a refund, but the court rejected it.

;

;;;

;According to case details disclosed by the Jiangxi Provincial Higher People’s Court, the plaintiff Li and the defendant Zhang are friends. In a certain conversation, Zhang said that he could help Li handle the formal establishment work of a certain unit. Subsequently, Li transferred 300,000 yuan to Zhang and entrusted him to handle it. After receiving the remittance, Zhang issued a "receipt" to Li and emphasized that if the transaction was not completed, a full refund would be issued.

;

;Later, because the work was not successfully handled, Zhang successively refunded 160,000 yuan to Li, but the remaining 140,000 yuan was never refunded. During this period, Zhang issued a "Commitment" to Li, promising to pay off the remaining money before the end of December 2020, but it was not fulfilled.

;

;Li sued Zhang to the court, requiring Zhang to return the remaining fees and pay interest and legal fees, totaling more than 150,000 yuan.

;

;The People's Court of Nanchang High-tech Zone held after hearing that the plaintiff Li paid money in the hope of entering a certain unit to solve formal staffing work. The behavior involved in the case was an illegal request, and the resulting dispute was not a civil legal relationship. Li attempted to achieve his own goals through improper means. This behavior itself promoted unhealthy trends in society, disrupted social order, violated the relevant laws and regulations of our country, and harmed social and public interests. The purpose and means of his behavior were illegal and should not be punished. Legal protection.

;

;The court rejected all Li’s claims. Li was dissatisfied and appealed, and the second instance upheld the original verdict.

;

;The court reminded that our country’s laws stipulate that when entering into and performing a contract, the parties shall abide by laws and administrative regulations, respect social ethics, and shall not disrupt the social and economic order or harm the public interests of the society.

;In October 2016, in Baidun Village, Guihua Town, Xian'an District, Xianning City, villagers picked osmanthus flowers in the osmanthus forest on the mountain in the early morning.

;

;As early as 2011, I went to Osmanthus Town in Xian'an District, Xianning City, Hubei Province several times to find the most original osmanthus forest in the area and photograph the process of local people collecting fresh osmanthus.

;

;;

;

;In September 2017, in Baidun Village, Guihua Town, Xian'an District, Xianning City, a husband beat osmanthus flowers on a tree while his wife picked them up under the tree.

;

;;

;

;In September 2021, in Baidun Village, Guihua Town, Xian'an District, Xianning City, in the light rain, an old couple in their seventies tactfully knocked on the osmanthus tree with their pennies.

;

;;

;

;In September 2011, villagers in Baidun Village, Guihua Town, Xian'an District, Xianning City, finished beating one osmanthus tree and prepared to move to another.

;

;The core area of ​​Guihua Town is in Mingshuiquan Village. Before 1984, several natural villages here (such as Duimenzhou, Getengping, Taiyuan Han, etc.) were collectively called "Osmanthus Village" because the ancient osmanthus trees here are the longest and most numerous. Osmanthus Village is at the foot of Guabang Mountain. The terrain is mainly mountains and hills, with small basins dotted with rivers and reservoirs. The climate is pleasant and is very suitable for the growth of osmanthus trees.

;

;;

;

;October 2021, Xianning City In Mingxing Village, Guihua Town, Xian'an District, villagers use bamboo sieves to filter the leaves from the osmanthus flowers.

;

;;

;

;October 2018, Xianning In Baidun Village, Guihua Town, Xian'an District, the city, villagers put the harvested osmanthus flowers into bags.

;

;;

;

;October 2021, In Sujiafang Village, Guihua Town, Xian'an District, Xianning City, villagers carefully clean up debris mixed with osmanthus flowers.

;

;Osmanthus flowers are usually collected in the morning. The sweet-scented osmanthus is stained with dew, which makes it fresh and easy to fall off. It is not easy to damage the tree. If the sun comes out and dries the dew on the flowers, it will be difficult and very damaging to the tree. After people gathered around a large osmanthus tree and spread out their tents, they picked up their bamboo pens and knocked them on the branches covered with flowers. The osmanthus flowers on the tree fell like rain. The person responsible for holding the canopy should adjust the position in the direction of the falling sweet-scented osmanthus and insert the flowers into the canopy. It is understood that each tree can generally bloom 30 to 40 kilograms of sweet-scented osmanthus every year, and the market purchase price is 5 to 8 yuan per kilogram. Guihua Town currently has an osmanthus planting area of ​​70,000 acres, with a flower output of 2 million jins. There are 26 cooperatives related to the osmanthus industry, 300 online stores, and retail sales of 250 million yuan.

;

;;

;

;January 2023, Xian'an, Xianning City In Mingshuiquan Village, Guihua Town, District, villagers fertilize ancient osmanthus trees.

;

;;

;

;2014 In May, villagers in Liujiaqiao Village, Guihua Town, Xian'an District, Xianning City, cut branches from ancient osmanthus trees in preparation for cuttings.

;February 2012, Xian'an District, Xianning City In Badun Village, Guihua Town, there is an osmanthus nursery where cuttings are grown.

;

;In fact, there is a deeper thought behind the filming and recording of "Nostalgia - Osmanthus Family". Unique and excellent crop varieties are the fruits of agricultural technology accumulated through thousands of years of human production practice. They are also an important carrier and witness of human agricultural civilization. The people of Guixiang have unique methods and methods for maintaining ancient osmanthus, collecting osmanthus, and cultivating nurseries. The whole process effectively protects the natural environment and fully reflects the cherishment of the land on which they depend for survival. In today's world of globalization, with the popularization of newly cultivated crop varieties, many traditional crops with regional characteristics are facing the crisis of extinction. Just like the global cultural convergence brought about by information technology, the popularization of hybrid technology and genetically modified technology has also caused The convergence and simplification of crop varieties, the loss of species diversity and cultural richness, lurks a huge species crisis and cultural crisis.

The customs and customs of Guixiang are still as vivid and vigorous as the century-old osmanthus trees. The people of Guixiang Life is like nurseries everywhere, full of vitality. I feel quite gratified that I was able to witness this unique agricultural species and agricultural landscape and leave some video data.

;The Harmony Home Community in Mingshui County, Suihua City, Heilongjiang Province is a shantytown reform community. It was built only 9 years ago and has three buildings. All of them have been identified as Class D dangerous buildings. More than 300 households have been forced to rent houses or stay with relatives and friends for four consecutive years. It is still difficult to move back.

;

;"Xinhua Viewpoint" reporters learned from the investigation that the conversion of sheds into dangerous buildings exposed the loopholes in local supervision of housing construction safety. At present, Mingshui County is accelerating the demolition of dangerous buildings in the shantytown-renovated communities involved, and plans to complete the reconstruction before the end of 2024.

;

;;;"There were cracks in the wall in the second year after the move back." The relevant responsible persons have been taken compulsory measures in accordance with the law;;

;

;"This It didn't work after the building was completed, and there were cracks in the walls the second year after we moved back. From then on, the problems became more and more serious until we left," said Liu Xiquan, a resident of the Harmony Home Community.

;

;Some residents interviewed told reporters that the quality problems of the houses in the Harmony Home Community emerged very early. Some people have a serious sinking floor, and some of the ground unevenness exceeds 5 cm, and some can feel obvious vibration even in the room. "Government supervision is not in place, and such 'tofu dregs projects' have passed the completion acceptance." A resident said.

;

; The reporter saw at the periphery of the Harmony Home Community that the entire community was surrounded by the wire mesh and could not enter. The communities are divided into three buildings A, B, and C. Building A, B, and B, and the second floor are commercial service areas, and the third to six floors are residential; Building C and the first floor are commercial service areas. Residential. Some units of Lou Dong are open, and there are many garbage and abandoned living items on the ground.

;

; ; ; ;

;

; ; On December 1st, the harmonious home district surrounded by the wire mesh, the Xinhua News Agency reporter Qiang Yong was photographed by Qiang Yong ;

;

; Xu Jian, deputy head of Mingshui County, introduced that the income of harmonious home community was completed in 2010. In July 2019, after receiving reports from the public that there were quality problems in the buildings, Mingshui County commissioned Heilongjiang Coldland Building Research Institute and other third-party institutions to conduct safety appraisals on the community multiple times.
